sections.heading: of law enforcement.At the request of a county attorney or the Attorney General acting under section 43-1262, a law enforcement officer may take any lawful action reasonably necessary to locate a child or a party and assist a county attorney or the Attorney General with responsibilities under such se
sections.text: of law enforcement.At the request of a county attorney or the Attorney General acting under section 43-1262, a law enforcement officer may take any lawful action reasonably necessary to locate a child or a party and assist a county attorney or the Attorney General with responsibilities under such section.SourceLaws 2003, LB 148, ยง 38.
